short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add a context menu item to load a new tab of the current page URL.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When you want to open a duplicate page and want to do it from anywhere on the page, just right click to open a new tab with the current page.
